cards.title: Oriphel
setup: At the start of the game, put {Oriphel}'s villain character cards into play, 'Shardwalker' side up. Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until {H - 2} guardians are revealed and put them into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever a villain relic enters play, play the top card of the villain deck.
Whenever a villain ongoing card enters play, destroy it and play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.advanced: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
flippedGameplay: When {Oriphel} is flipped to this side, shuffle all relics in the villain trash into the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, {Oriphel} deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP {H - 1} infernal damage each.
When there are 2 villain relics in the villain trash, flip {Oriphel}'s villain character cards.

openingLines.MinistryOfStrategicScienceMailchaeCharac: Ministry Of Strategic Science Mailchae placeholder

cards.title: Grand Oriphel
body: At the start of the villain turn, destroy this card unless it entered play this turn.
Increase damage dealt by {Oriphel} by 1. Reduce damage dealt to {Oriphel} by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, {Oriphel} deals each hero target 1 infernal damage and 1 projectile damage.
cards.flavorReference: Entry in the Scrolls of Zephaeren

cards.title: High Asriel
body: When a hero card is played, this card deals the hero with the highest HP 2 psychic damage.
When this card is destroyed, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a Relic is revealed and play it. Shuffle the remaining cards into the villain deck.
cards.flavorReference: Entry in the Scrolls of Zephaeren

cards.title: High Djaril
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} lightning damage.
When this card is destroyed, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a Relic is revealed and play it. Shuffle the remaining cards into the villain deck.
cards.flavorReference: Entry in the Scrolls of Zephaeren

cards.title: High Phaol
body: The first time any hero target deals damage to any villain target each turn, this card deals that hero target 3 cold damage.
When this card is destroyed, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a Relic is revealed and play it. Shuffle the remaining cards into the villain deck.
cards.flavorReference: Entry in the Scrolls of Zephaeren

cards.title: High Tormul
body: At the start of each hero turn, this card deals that hero 2 toxic damage.
When this card is destroyed, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a Relic is revealed and play it. Shuffle the remaining cards into the villain deck.
cards.flavorReference: Entry in the Scrolls of Zephaeren

cards.title: Meji Clan Leader
body: Reduce damage dealt to Goons by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero target 3 melee damage.

cards.title: Meji Guard
body: Reduce damage dealt to Guardians by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero with the most cards in hand 2 melee damage.

cards.title: Meji Nomad
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP X projectile damage, where X is the number of Guardians in play plus 2.

flavorQuotes.text: There are djinn that lurk{BR}on this side of the Veil, eternal{BR}Guardians of the keys. Find them.

cards.title: Mirage
body: Reveal the top 2 cards of the villain deck. Put any revealed targets or Transformation cards into play and discard the rest.
Each Goon deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 fire damage.

cards.title: Moon Shardkey
body: At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If a Transformation card is revealed, play it, otherwise put it on the bottom of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, the villain target with the highest HP deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Bathiel has a score to settle with you.

cards.title: Sandstorm
body: Shuffle the villain trash and reveal cards until X Goons are revealed, where X is 1 plus the number of environment cards in play.
Put the revealed Goons into play and discard the other cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Phaol was standing watch{BR}over these ruins. The shardkey{BR}must be here somewhere!

cards.title: Scrolls of Zephaeren
body: Shuffle all Guardians from the villain trash into the villain deck.
Play the top card of the villain deck.
If {Oriphel} is in play, he deals the hero target with the second lowest HP 3 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: There's giant monsters fighting{BR}each other! Am I in the right place?

cards.title: Shardbearer Nathaniel
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by Guardians and {Oriphel} by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Greetings, Shardcatcher.{BR}I see you brought your pets.

cards.title: Shardwalker's Awakening
body: If {Oriphel} is in play, he deals each hero target 1 infernal and 1 projectile damage.
If Jade is in play, flip her villain character cards.

flavorQuotes.text: With the assembled keys, she{BR}won't need a summoning crystal to{BR}bring Oriphel into this realm.

cards.title: Sun Shardkey
body: At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If a Transformation card is revealed, play it, otherwise put it on the bottom of the villain deck.
Whenever a hero uses a power, that hero deals themselves 2 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You'll go mad! Your mind{BR}cannot share its vessel with a{BR}being of such power.

cards.title: Umbral Javelin
body: If Jade is in play, reveal the top {H} cards of the villain deck. Put any revealed Goons and Guardians into play and discard the rest.
If {Oriphel} is in play, destroy {H} hero ongoing and/or equipment cards. Play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: What is she trying{BR}so desperately to find{BR}with that compass?

cards.title: Veil Shardkey
body: At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If a Transformation card is revealed, play it, otherwise put it on the bottom of the villain deck.
Whenever another villain target is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: We must disrupt the{BR}ritual before it's too late.

cards.title: World Shardkey
body: At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If a Transformation card is revealed, play it, otherwise put it on the bottom of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, the villain target with the highest HP deals the hero target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: ...He has whispered to me from{BR}the other side. My flesh will be the{BR}instrument of summoning!
